parameters.name: ChordTolerance
parameters.description: Chord tolerance to be used in tessellation (meters); this is the maximum permitted distance from a cord to the curve between the cord endpoints

parameters.name: LengthTolerance
parameters.description: Length tolerance to be used to filter out very short segments (meters); tessellated segments shorter than this value are not returned

parameters.name: StartPoint
parameters.description: Pointer to an array containing the start point of the curve

parameters.name: EndPoint
parameters.description: Pointer to an array containing the end point of the curve

title: ICurve.IGetTessPtsSize
description: Gets the size of the array required by ICurve::IGetTessPts.
signature:
System.Int32 IGetTessPtsSize( 
   System.Double
ChordTolerance
,
   System.Double
LengthTolerance
,
   ref System.Double
StartPoint
,
   ref System.Double
EndPoint
)

parameters.name: ChordTolerance
parameters.description: Chord tolerance to be used in tessellation (meters); this is the maximum permitted distance from a cord to the curve between the cord endpoints

parameters.name: LengthTolerance
parameters.description: Length tolerance to be used to filter out very short segments (meters); tessellated segments shorter than this value are not returned

parameters.name: StartPoint
parameters.description: Pointer to an array containing the start point of the curve

parameters.name: EndPoint
parameters.description: Pointer to an array containing the end point of the curve

returns: Number of doubles returned when ICurve::IGetTessPts is called
remarks:
To get the actual tessellation points, use
ICurve::IGetTessPts
. Arguments passed to ICurve::IGetTessPts must match the arguments passed to this method.
